entities.name: platform nine and three-quarters
entities.description: Platform 9 3/4 is a magical platform where wizards and witches can board the Hogwarts Express. It is located between platforms 9 and 10 at King's Cross Station in London.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character of the story. He is a wizard who is about to board the Hogwarts Express to attend his first year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: hogwarts express
entities.description: The Hogwarts Express is a magical train that takes students from Platform 9 3/4 to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. It is a scarlet steam engine with carriages packed with students.

entities.name: hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry
entities.description: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry is a magical school for young wizards and witches. It is located in Scotland and is the main setting for the story.

entities.name: king's cross station
entities.description: King's Cross Station is a real-life train station in London where Platform 9 3/4 is located.

relationships.description: Harry Potter boarded the Hogwarts Express from Platform 9 3/4.

relationships.entity_2: hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry
relationships.description: The Hogwarts Express is headed to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
